data.title: Davenport IA Insurance Brokers
data.meta_description: HUB International Davenport provides a wide range of insurance solutions. Learn about HUB Davenport IA insurance offerings here.
data.text:
Effective January 18, 2021 HUB has enhanced its servicing for all personal insurance products. Please reference our updated Personal Insurance Customer Support contact information listed. We look forward to meeting your future insurance needs!

Personal Insurance Customer Support

Phone: 833-771-1338

Email: [email protected]

Service Center Hours: Monday through Friday from 7AM – 6PM Central Time

HUB International Davenport, formerly Ruhl & Ruhl Insurance, traces its roots to 1862 and has been proudly serving Eastern Iowa and Western Illinois for their insurance needs for over 150 years. In August 2014, Ruhl & Ruhl Insurance became part of HUB International. The acquisition has allowed our customers to have access to the many resources that are offered by a globally-recognized firm, and continue receiving the close, local working relationships and quality customer service that they deserve.

Our Davenport insurance office staff is committed to offering prompt and personalized attention to each of our customers. We are eager to help you find the right coverages and services that fit your needs. After analyzing your total cost of risk, insurance is just one solution among the many that we can offer. As a customer of HUB International Davenport, we will provide you with quality customer service and high levels of satisfaction through offering innovative, sustainable, customized, and cost-effective solutions for your risk management needs.

HUB Gives is a program that encourages HUB employees to donate their time, creativity, passion and connections to community projects. Each Regional HUB Office chooses a local organization or cause, and develops a project that will make a difference where it's needed - from fighting disease to working with families in need, to improving the lives of senior citizens and youth.

At HUB Davenport, we support a variety of local charities and non-profit organizations that serve the residents of our community.
